if_else_conditional.name: If/Else conditional
if_else_conditional.code: if(condition){code block to be executed} else {code block to be executed}

if_elseif_conditional.name: If/ElseIf conditional
if_elseif_conditional.code: if(condition){code block to be executed} else if(condition){code block to be executed}

if_elseif_else_conditional.name: If/ElseIf/Else conditional
if_elseif_else_conditional.code: if(condition){code block to be executed} else if(condition){code block to be executed} else {code block to be executed}

do_while_loop.name: Do/While loop
do_while_loop.code: do {code block to be executed} while(condition)

for_loop.name: For loop
for_loop.code: for(statement1 (counter variable(s)); statement2 (condition to keep the loop running); statement3 (statement executed each time after the loop has been executed)){code block to be executed}
